items.sentence: Tom wasn\'t getting any help from anyone, so he gave up.
Tom wasn\'t wearing his uniform the last time I saw him.
Tom forgot to tell Mary what he had planned to tell her.
Tom forwarded John the email that he received from Mary.
Tom found a good restaurant not too far from our campus.
Tom found it hard to make a living as a street musician.
Tom found it more and more difficult to ignore the pain.
Tom gave Mary some good advice about how to write songs.
Do you think we\'ll be able to do this without any help?
We\'ve got to make sure Tom doesn\'t ever do that again.
